HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Microsoft Surface Academy 2009 interns have created some controls for Microsoft Surface Tables.

This toolkit contains :
A basic gesture recognition control
A card game starter kit
An implement of the Mitsu Furuta's book control
Circular menu control

The card starterkit is not a game. It's made for people who want to develop a card game on Microsoft Surface. It brings cards contents and basic gestures (flip, stacks, decks, layouts, animations, etc).
Here is a video of the card starterkit: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B8m26mJnPKk
Long version is here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d6wPYOozkzI
